title: Oy Yew
description: ‘Lay low and grow,’ is the motto of the waifs of Duldred Hall. The only way to escape their life of drudgery is to reach the height that earns their freedom. But Master Jeopardine is determined to ‘feed them little and keep them small.’ When the master’s methods grow more sinister it seems there is little they can do. Until Oy arrives and the fight for survival begins.
author: Ana Salote
